, a game in which the Eagles trailed by 21 points in the fourth quarter. " Michael Vick has great instincts. Michael Vick 's got it all at this point," Eagles offensive coordinator Marty Mornhinweg said. Really, the most important quality, in my opinion, for a quarterback to have is gut instincts, then comes the decision-making and the timing and accuracy. Then comes the big arm and athleticism and those types of things. The gut instincts are critical for a quarterback, and you can see that. Not only did Michael Vick make a remarkable turnaround on the field, but his image is improving away from the game.
